Over the years that followed, Donald Rumsfeld observes drily: That particular remark came to my mind on more than one occasion and I never had cause to doubt it. The biggest regret Donald Rumsfeld has is that he failed to resign after the photographs of American soldiers abusing prisoners at Abu Ghraib came to light in 2004. for playing Sylvester in the hit US TV Show, also went on to claim that despite various campaigns, Glee villain Sue could never join SiCo on the US X Factor judging panel. Jane Lynch explained: People have asked me, "What about having Sue on The X Factor? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears. is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. "I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football," he said. This is what you work for. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.
